title: Tree​
content: </> type Tree = CanBeState<{string}> An array of strings shown in the ui element.

title: Index​
content: </> type Index = StateObject<number> A number that indicates what string in the Tree should be shown.

title: Properties​

title: Tick​
content: </> type Tick = StateObject<boolean> A boolean StateObject that will switch when you click on Checkbox.
